forecast.day_comments: Snow, mainly before 2pm.  Temperature falling to around 25 by 5pm. West northwest wind 7 to 11 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 90%. Total daytime snow accumulation of 2 to 4 inches possible.
forecast.night_comments: A 30 percent chance of snow, mainly before 8pm.  Mostly cloudy, with a low around 16. West northwest wind 3 to 5 mph.  New snow accumulation of less than a half inch possible.
